name: PsychoBombRush
description:
Small game prototype (based on old Psycho Pigs game on c64)

Website:
http://games.unitycoder.com/PsychoBombRush/

Controls:
Player#1 = WASD+Left shift (or xbox controller #1)
Player#2 = ArrowKeys+Right shift (or xbox controller #2)

Esc = Quit

Instructions:
In one player mode you have 3 lives, in 2 player mode you can resurrect other player, but if both die, then its game over. Lives are replenished if level is passed.

* NEW: Update 2 is now available for PC *
